verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana anakuja,
anakuja kwetu anakuja. x2
Tengenezeni njia yake
yanyosheni mapito yake
anakuja kutukomboa. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Waambieni wanaokufa moyo,
anakuja msiogope,
bali jipeni moyo anakuja.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Furahini wote katika
Bwana, anakuja.
Anakuja naye hatakawia,
anakuja.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Afikapo Bwana na malaika,
anakuja.
Kiti cha enzi atakikalia,
anakuja,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mataifa yote yatakusanywa,
anakuja.
Mbele yake Bwana hakimu wao,
anakuja.
